comments.body:
I think you can pass the return from `getChannelHistory` directly to `RocketChat.API.v1.success`..
It will be better than having as return a field `result` with an object with a field `messages`.

The related Slack method can be found [here](https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat/pull/4544/files). Couple of questions:
1. While the input generally follows the input, the output response seems to be quite different. How closely do you want to adhere to the Slack API? If going for full compatibility you should perform a transformed result.
2. What is your plan for pagination? Pagination for Slack is managed by checking for the `has_more` property and adjusting the oldest parameter. The link above includes a discussion of how it is performed inside of Slack.
